description:
Tomozaki confronts Hinami over her handling of the Konno affair. He`s tasked with making a good impression on his classmates - plus a big decision.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Everyone Has Different Expectations About a Big Event
Ookina Event no Ura ni wa Sorezore no Omowaku ga Aru
大きなイベントの裏にはそれぞれの思惑がある
